name: Cornin's Hope
description:
What is happened in Cornin's passover? What is wrong with main hero? Where he is?

While playing this lowpoly atmospheric game you will find the answers to these questions!

Cornin's Hope is a first-person exploration game, you need to find the way out from spooky and cold terrain. Here 5 beacons are holding the exit closed. Deactivate them to finally escape!

It is my debut project, follow me on Twitter for some cool stuff and informaiton about future games!
